@usedefault
{{html:
<h1>DNS</h1>
<!-- ko if: domains().length > 0 -->
<!-- ko foreach: domains -->
    <input type="text" data-bind="value: name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'">
    <select data-bind="options: $parent.buckets, optionsText: 'name', value: bucket"></select>
    <input type='submit' value='Remove domain' data-bind="click: remove" class="btn btn-info btn-large " />

    <br>
    <!-- ko foreach: records -->
    <input type=radio value='A'  data-bind="checked: type">A
    <input type=radio value='NS'  data-bind="checked: type">NS
    <input type=radio value='CNAME'  data-bind="checked: type">CNAME
    <br>
    <div data-bind="visible: type() == 'A'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: ipAddress, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="IP Address">
    </div>
    <div data-bind="visible: type() == 'NS'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname">
    </div>
    <div data-bind="visible: type() == 'CNAME'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname">
    </div>
    <br>
    <!-- /ko -->
    <input type=radio value='A'  data-bind="checked: newRecord().type">A
    <input type=radio value='NS'  data-bind="checked: newRecord().type">NS
    <input type=radio value='CNAME'  data-bind="checked: newRecord().type">CNAME
    <br>
    <div data-bind="visible: newRecord().type() == 'A'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().ipAddress, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="IP Address">
    </div>
    <div data-bind="visible: newRecord().type() == 'NS'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname">
    </div>
    <div data-bind="visible: newRecord().type() == 'CNAME'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname">
    </div>
    <input type='submit' value='Add record' data-bind="click: addRecord, enable: newRecord().valid() == true" class="btn btn-info btn-large " />
    
    <hr>
<!-- /ko -->
<!-- /ko -->
<input type="text" data-bind="value: newDomain().name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'">
<select data-bind="options: buckets, optionsText: 'name', value: newDomain().bucket, optionsCaption: 'Select bucket...'"></select>
<input type="submit" value="Add Domain" data-bind="click: addDomain, enable: !!(newDomain().name() && newDomain().bucket())">
}}
